overview:
Working on the web since 1996 resulted in Resource Studio a Dutch webdesign group, Viewbook (http://www.viewbook.com) for professional online image presentations.

Main focus on the initiation, concepting and management of website projects. Also as consultant for other companies.

Rien Swagerman’s Specialties: Both generalist and specialist with experience in website concepting, art-direction, functional design, interaction design, information architecture, programming, project management and consultancy.
